title: I STOCK in a game which start before the client shut down for update
body: what should i do now if i stuck in a game which started before the client shut down for update, now the update is finish i try to start a new game but the system keep let me reconnect to the game i started before the update shut down. and the point is i can't even success connect to the game

replies.body: I am currently having the same issue, This issue that needs to be resolved ASAP.
Ah the old ghost game epidemic.
Same issues for me it's really irritating.. I agree this issue needs to be resolved ASAP
Same problem here. I've tried re-logging in a few times and everytime, it showed that the game had started only 10ish seconds.
now in op.gg shows my game is already finish but i still stuck in the reconnect mode.....
and i check from the op.gg the game is still running now is 40 mins wtf....
